title: Online Formative Assessment and Real-Time Discussion Module Application Course for Strengthening Nursing Humanities Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Smartphone-accessible nursing humanities curriculum with VR simulation-based field-immersive learning environment

learning_goals: Learners successfully perform ethical decision-making cases centered on patients by applying nursing humanities communication skills in VR simulations with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners receive personalized feedback via Online Formative Assessment (OFA) three or more times within 24 hours and write self-reflection reports.

Learners proactively participate in discussions on nursing humanities issues (e.g., patient autonomy, cultural sensitivity) in real-time discussion modules and achieve ≥4 points (out of 5) in peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
